mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE date_range AS ( SELECT DATE(#{begin}) AS dt UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM date_range WHERE dt <= DATE(#{end}) ) SELECT dr.dt AS date, ( select count(1) from user u where DATE(u.create_time) = dr.dt ) AS daily_new_users, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user u WHERE DATE(u.create_time) <= dr.dt ) AS cumulative_users FROM date_range dr ORDER BY dr.dt;
